recordLookups.name: Get_Active_Contracts_for_Account_and_Brand
recordLookups.label: Get Active Contracts for Account and Brand

recordLookups.description:
In this step, the flow is getting records for all active subscription contracts where the product type is = Main and either User Count Rollups is greater than 1 or the SKU Product is equal to the LawPay Classic record id.
**The record ID "a2g8W0000036pwNQAQ" indicates the LawPay Classic SKU Product.

textTemplates.name: txtEmailBodyMultipleMainProducts
textTemplates.text: An unexpected condition has occurred. The Subscription Contract has more than one main product for the brand. Please examine and correct the issue. Below is a link to the record. {!fmlaContractLink}

textTemplates.name: txtEmailMessageBodyAlreadyActiveForMainProduct
txtEmailMessageBodyMultipleContractsPlainText
textTemplates.text: Close processing for Opportunity {!recOpportunity.Name} has multiple active contracts for brand {!recOpportunity.Record_Type_Name__c}. Please review the Subscription Contract records for this account deactivate the unnecessary record(s). Below is a link to the opportunity. {!fmlaOpportunityLink}

textTemplates.name: txtEmailSubjectLine
textTemplates.text: Attention Needed on Closed Opportunity Processing for {!recOpportunity.Name},
